title: CryptoHFs
author: CryptoHFs
content: I am open to offers from anywhere in the worldI want to launch a 0.25 EH/s bitcoin mining farm I don't need any headaches I can only fund.If you can manage my farm, if you know services that do so and take care of everything legally, physically please contact me or post a comment with the details

comments.author: Sledge0001
comments.body: Sent you a private message regarding this.
